statements: SELECT * FROM CancerPatients;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM CancerPatients WHERE diagnosis = 'Breast Cancer';
SELECT treatment_plan, appointment_date FROM CancerPatients WHERE appointment_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM CancerPatients ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, physician_name FROM CancerPatients WHERE physician_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM CancerPatients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, appointment_date FROM CancerPatients WHERE diagnosis = 'Lung Cancer' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM CancerPatients WHERE treatment_plan IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM CancerPatients WHERE physician_name = 'Dr. Smith' AND appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients, physician_name FROM CancerPatients GROUP BY physician_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_patients DESC;
SELECT * FROM treatment_plans WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, patient_id, start_date, end_date FROM treatment_plans WHERE patient_id = 10;
SELECT plan_details->>'treatment' FROM treatment_plans WHERE patient_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE physician_id = 3 ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT id, patient_id, appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE patient_id = 7 ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
SELECT id, patient_id, start_date, end_date, plan_details FROM treatment_plans WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE status = 'confirmed' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(id) AS num_appointments FROM appointments GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(id) > 3;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_id, physician_id, appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM appointment_date) = 10 AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM appointment_date) = 2022;
SELECT id, patient_id, start_date, end_date, plan_details FROM treatment_plans WHERE patient_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, cancer_type FROM patients ORDER BY cancer_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM treatment_plans WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_type FROM appointments WHERE status = 'Confirmed' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, cancer_type FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, cancer_type FROM patients ORDER BY patient_age DESC;

SELECT p.patient_name, t.plan_details, a.appointment_date FROM patients p INNER JOIN treatment_plans t ON p.patient_id = t.patient_id INNER JOIN appointments a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id WHERE a.appointment_type = 'Follow-up';
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients, patient_gender FROM patients GROUP BY patient_gender HAVING COUNT(patient_id) > 1 ORDER BY total_patients DESC;
SELECT * FROM treatment_plans;
SELECT patient_id, plan_details FROM treatment_plans ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE doctor_name = 'Dr. Smith';
SELECT id, patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM doctors WHERE hospital = 'General Hospital';
SELECT * FROM treatment_plans ORDER BY start_date DESC, end_date ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE diagnosis = 'Cancer';
SELECT doctor_name, specialty, hospital FROM doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology' ORDER BY doctor_name;
SELECT appointment_date, doctor_name FROM appointments WHERE patient_id = 12345;
SELECT plan_details FROM treatment_plans WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM treatment_plans ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM doctors WHERE doctor_id = 1;
SELECT appointment_date, doctor_name FROM appointments WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC, date_of_birth ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender='Male' AND date_of_birth>'1980-01-01' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_name, doctor_name, appointment_date FROM appointments INNER JOIN doctors ON appointments.doctor_name = doctors.doctor_name ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, test_name, result FROM patients INNER JOIN diagnostic_tests ON patients.patient_id = diagnostic_tests.patient_id WHERE result='Positive';

SELECT patient_name, plan_description, start_date, end_date FROM patients INNER JOIN treatment_plans ON patients.patient_id = treatment_plans.patient_id WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
